entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is recognized as Bane by others in the text.

entities.name: bane
entities.description: Bane is a magical creature with near-human intelligence, according to Law Fifteen B.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione says 'Don't call them that!' in response to Umbridge's actions.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is pointing her wand at Magorian and citing Law Fifteen B.

entities.name: magorian
entities.description: Magorian is a centaur who roars with rage in response to Umbridge's actions.

entities.name: law fifteen b
entities.description: Law Fifteen B states that 'Any attack by a magical creature who is deemed to have near-human intelligence...'

relationships.description: Umbridge points her wand at Magorian and cites Law Fifteen B.
Bane considers 'near-human intelligence' a great insult to humans.
Magorian roars with rage in response to Umbridge's actions.
Harry and Hermione have visited the forest before.
Umbridge disputes Magorian's claim that it is their forest.
